author: Project Veritas
description:
In an exclusive leak obtained by Project Veritas, Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty President Stephen Capus blasts Kari Lake, new Senior Director of U.S. Agency for Global Media (USAGM), for “depraved management” and disrespecting the organization in a May 2025 call.

title: Exclusive Leak: Radio Free Europe President Slams Kari Lake’s “Depraved" Leadership; "APPALLING"
